name: Dream Paladin (Spring2DJam2021)
description:
2-day rushed game for Spring 2D Jam 2021 (May 1 - May 2), with theme: Growth. Made with Johanssen "AntoReakk" Gan.

Sound Files used:

button sounds: https://freesound.org/people/lmbubec/sounds/118792/ (modified)

enemy swipe: https://freesound.org/people/mrickey13/sounds/515625/ (modified)

enemy damaged: https://freesound.org/people/ryansitz/sounds/387834/ (modified)

player swipe: https://freesound.org/people/mrickey13/sounds/515625/ (modified)

player damaged: https://freesound.org/people/nekoninja/sounds/370204/

player building: https://freesound.org/people/deleted_user_7146007/sounds/383446/ (modified)

turret fire: https://freesound.org/people/reg7783/sounds/131304/ (modified)

turret damaged: https://freesound.org/people/ryansitz/sounds/387834/ (modified)

bed damaged: https://freesound.org/people/kingsrow/sounds/194693/ (modified)
